review: Total piece of crap. Worked for all of about 15 minutes, just long enough for me to sign up for Amazon Prime and log into Netflix. Now it won't work at all. My settings say my wifi is "very strong" and my internet is definitely working because that's how I'm posting this review but when I try to go to the home screen it says Home is currently unavailable. Very frustrating considering I waited six weeks for delivery. Sending it back tomorrow and going with Apple TV which I already have in another room and have very little trouble with.
